perturbation.original_text: (b) Effect of Termination/Expiration: In the event of termination of this Agreement, Licensee shall: (i) immediately stop in all respects the sale and distribution of the Wireless Products and provide Fox with a complete inventory report and accounting with
perturbation.changed_text: (b) Effect of Termination/Expiration: In the event of termination of this Agreement, Distributor shall: (i) immediately stop in all respects the sale and distribution of the Wireless Products and provide Fox with a complete inventory report and accounting with
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Licensee' to 'Distributor' creates ambiguity. The contract consistently refers to Sorrento, Inc. as the 'Licensee.' By introducing 'Distributor,' it becomes unclear whether this refers to the same entity or a different party, leading to uncertainty about who is obligated to stop the sale and distribution.

perturbation.original_text:
8. DUTIES OF LICENSEE:
(a) Marketing and Promotion: Licensee shall be responsible for all marketing, advertising and promotional efforts with respect to the Wireless
Products throughout the Territory during the Term.
perturbation.changed_text:
8. DUTIES OF LICENSEE:
(a) Marketing and Promotion: Contractor shall be responsible for all marketing, advertising and promotional efforts with respect to the Wireless
Products throughout the Territory during the Term.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Licensee' to 'Contractor' creates ambiguity regarding who is responsible for marketing and promotion. The contract defines and uses 'Licensee' consistently. Introducing 'Contractor' without definition makes it unclear if this refers to a third party or if the 'Licensee' is now also considered the 'Contractor.' This creates uncertainty in determining responsibility for these key obligations.

perturbation.original_text:
(a) Payments from Licensee to Fox: In consideration of the rights granted to Licensee pursuant to this Agreement, Licensee shall pay to Fox, or
such other party as Fox may designate in writing, a royalty in the following amounts:
perturbation.changed_text:
(a) Payments from Sorrent to Fox: In consideration of the rights granted to Licensee pursuant to this Agreement, Debtor shall pay to Fox, or
such other party as Fox may designate in writing, a royalty in the following amounts:
perturbation.explanation: Altering 'Licensee' to 'Debtor' implies a financial obligation beyond the scope of the license agreement. While the contract outlines royalty payments, referring to the Licensee as 'Debtor' suggests a pre-existing debt or a different financial arrangement, causing contradiction and uncertainty about the basis for payment obligations.
